TestCase.name: testFilterAndProjection
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f1, f5 FROM T WHERE (f1 < 1 OR f2 > 10) AND f3 IS NOT NULL
LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f5=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(OR(<($1, 1), >($2, 10)), IS NOT NULL($3))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[f1, f5], where=[IS NOT NULL(f3)]) +- ChangelogNormalize(key=[f1, f2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f1, f2]]) +- Calc(select=[f1, f2, f3, f5], where=[OR(<(f1, 1), >(f2, 10))]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7])

TestCase.name: testWithMultiplePrimaryKeyColumns
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, f1 FROM T WHERE (f1 < 1 OR f2 > 10) AND f0 IS NOT NULL
LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(OR(<($1, 1), >($2, 10)), IS NOT NULL($0))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[f0, f1], where=[IS NOT NULL(f0)]) +- ChangelogNormalize(key=[f1, f2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f1, f2]]) +- Calc(select=[f0, f1, f2], where=[OR(<(f1, 1), >(f2, 10))]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1, f2])

TestCase.name: testOnlyProjection
TestCase.Resource: ChangelogNormalize(key=[f1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f1]]) +- Calc(select=[f1, f2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1, f2])

TestCase.name: testPartialPrimaryKeyFilterAndProjection
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f1, f5 FROM T WHERE f1 < 1 AND f3 IS NOT NULL
LogicalProject(f1=[$1], f5=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($1, 1), IS NOT NULL($3))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[f1, f5], where=[IS NOT NULL(f3)]) +- ChangelogNormalize(key=[f1, f2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f1, f2]]) +- Calc(select=[f1, f2, f3, f5], where=[<(f1, 1)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7])

TestCase.name: testWithSinglePrimaryKeyFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(f0=[$0], f1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
ChangelogNormalize(key=[f1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f1]]) +- Calc(select=[f0, f1], where=[<(f1, 1)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1])

TestCase.name: testWithMultipleFilters
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f1, SUM(f1) AS `sum` FROM T WHERE f1 < 10 AND (f1 > 3 OR f2 IS NULL) GROUP BY f1

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(f1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($1, 10), OR(>($1, 3), IS NULL($2)))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[f1, f1 AS sum], where=[OR(>(f1, 3), IS NULL(f2))]) +- ChangelogNormalize(key=[f1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f1]]) +- Calc(select=[f1, f2], where=[<(f1, 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1, f2])
